column5: Hi everybody.  Stopped in at the Dollar store today and found these;    They had a lot of these in various colors but only two sizes.  The larger one is about 4 inches and the smaller ones about 3 inches.  In London, Dollarama on Wellington rd. S., the plaza with the theaters.
Great lures. My cousin has caught a lot of fish on those things.
Thanks FB, I might head over there on the way to work! I hope they don't get cleaned out in the next half hour. -Brian
gotta love that that crap is only a buck eh
those have been in the stores here in kanata for quite some time too, picked a bunch of those up and some Strom lures
My Dollarama has some storm stuff I've been waiting for the Blue Fox to come in, great lures!
They look pretty good for a dollar.
Going there tommorow!  Thanks for the heads up.
